value.name: 'Why did he die?' | Family demands answers after son killed on VIA bus by police
value.description: KENS 5 is learning more about the man who was killed. Investigators say Terry Wayne Bishop was carrying a gun inside the bus before VIA Transit Police shot him. However, three weeks later ...

value.name: Family of bus passenger shot, killed by VIA Transit police still looking for answers
value.description: SAN ANTONIO – It’s been almost two weeks and still, the family of 28-year-old Terry Wayne Bishop is looking for answers. Bishop, who allegedly was carrying a gun on a VIA Transit bus ...

value.name: Police: Suspect fatally shot by VIA Transit Police after altercation on bus
value.description: SAN ANTONIO — UPDATE: The man who was killed by VIA Transit Police has been identified as 28-year-old Terry Wayne Bishop. See previous story below: A man is dead after being shot by VIA Transit ...
